Introduction to the Topic.name: Introduction to the Topic
Introduction to the Topic.summary: Introduces the topic of how to use the new AI tool.
Introduction to the Topic.content: Okay, so today we're going to talk about how to use the new AI tool.

Accessing the AI Tool.name: Accessing the AI Tool
Accessing the AI Tool.summary: Explains the first step to access the AI tool, which is logging into the company portal and finding the AI tool icon.
Accessing the AI Tool.content: First, you'll need to log in to the company portal and find the AI tool icon on the main dashboard.

Initial AI Tool Interface.name: Initial AI Tool Interface
Initial AI Tool Interface.summary: Describes the initial interface of the AI tool, including a search bar and pre-set options, after clicking the icon.
Initial AI Tool Interface.content: Once you click on the icon, you'll be taken to the main interface, which has a search bar and a few pre-set options.

Using the Search Bar.name: Using the Search Bar
Using the Search Bar.summary: Explains that the search bar is the easiest way to find specific information by typing in what you are looking for.
Using the Search Bar.content: The search bar is the easiest way to find specific information. Just type in what you're looking for.

AI Tool Response.name: AI Tool Response
AI Tool Response.summary: Describes that the AI tool will generate a list of relevant documents and FAQs in response to a search query.
AI Tool Response.content: The AI will then generate a list of relevant documents and FAQs.

Pre-set Options.name: Pre-set Options
Pre-set Options.summary: Explains that the AI tool also provides pre-set options for common tasks like generating reports or scheduling meetings.
Pre-set Options.content: Alternatively, you can use the pre-set options for common tasks like generating reports or scheduling meetings.

Generating Reports.name: Generating Reports
Generating Reports.summary: Describes how to generate a report by selecting the 'Generate Report' option and choosing the report type.
Generating Reports.content: To generate a report, simply select the 'Generate Report' option and choose the type of report you need.

Scheduling Meetings.name: Scheduling Meetings
Scheduling Meetings.summary: Describes how to schedule meetings by clicking on 'Schedule Meeting' and following the prompts.
Scheduling Meetings.content: For scheduling meetings, click on 'Schedule Meeting' and follow the prompts to invite attendees and set a time.

Introduction to the Project.name: Introduction to the Project
Introduction to the Project.summary: The project focuses on constructing a knowledge graph derived from conversational data.
Introduction to the Project.content: The project is about building a knowledge graph from conversations.

Task of the Expert System Component.name: Task of the Expert System Component
Task of the Expert System Component.summary: The expert system component determines the integration method for analyzed conversational sub-chunks within a knowledge graph.
Task of the Expert System Component.content: The expert system component decides how to integrate analyzed conversational sub-chunks into an existing knowledge graph.
Task of the Expert System Component.source_chunk: Task of the Expert System Component

Available Relationship Types.name: Available Relationship Types
Available Relationship Types.summary: Lists the different relationship types that can be used to connect nodes in the knowledge graph.
Available Relationship Types.parent: Task of the Expert System Component
Available Relationship Types.content: The available relationship types include 'part of', 'elaborates on', 'leads to', 'implements', 'exemplifies', 'contrasts with', 'depends on', 'relates to', 'follows', and 'includes'.

Input: Analyzed Sub-chunks.name: Input: Analyzed Sub-chunks
Input: Analyzed Sub-chunks.summary: The input consists of a JSON list of analyzed sub-chunks, each with name, text, relevant_node_name, and relationship attributes.
Input: Analyzed Sub-chunks.parent: Task of the Expert System Component
Input: Analyzed Sub-chunks.content: The input is a JSON list of analyzed sub-chunks, each containing a name, text, relevant_node_name, and relationship.

Output: JSON Object.name: Output: JSON Object
Output: JSON Object.summary: The output is a JSON object that includes the decision and metadata for each processed sub-chunk.
Output: JSON Object.parent: Task of the Expert System Component
Output: JSON Object.content: The output is a JSON object containing the decision and metadata for all processed sub-chunks.

Data Collection.name: Data Collection
Data Collection.summary: The initial step involves gathering data on movies and user preferences.
Data Collection.content: First, we need to collect data about movies and user preferences.

Data Preprocessing.name: Data Preprocessing
Data Preprocessing.summary: The subsequent step is to clean and format the collected data.
Data Preprocessing.content: Next, we need to preprocess the data to clean and format it.

Feature Engineering.name: Feature Engineering
Feature Engineering.summary: After preprocessing, features need to be engineered from the data.
Feature Engineering.content: Then, we need to engineer features from the data.

Model Selection.name: Model Selection
Model Selection.summary: Following feature engineering, a suitable model needs to be selected.
Model Selection.content: After that, we need to select a suitable model.

Model Training.name: Model Training
Model Training.summary: The selected model is then trained using the preprocessed data.
Model Training.content: Next, we train the selected model using the preprocessed data.

Model Evaluation.name: Model Evaluation
Model Evaluation.summary: The model's performance is evaluated after training.
Model Evaluation.content: Then, we evaluate the model's performance.

Model Deployment.name: Model Deployment
Model Deployment.summary: The final step is to deploy the model to provide recommendations.
Model Deployment.content: Finally, we deploy the model to make recommendations.
